amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to pay a Federal employee for any period of time during which such an employee is using official time.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to pay a Federal employee for any period of time during which such employee is using official time under section 7131 of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 295).

action.text: Mr. Connolly demanded a separate vote on the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A062).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 295).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 295).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Gingrey (GA).
